uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.xdoc

Class XDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.xdoc.XDocument

  • public class XDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an XML format document, providing, via a tree of XNode objects, a set of higher-level methods for reading from, and writing to, the document.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs object for creating a document.
